meanings.definition: From the back to the front
meanings.sent1: The squirrel climbed dorsoventrally up the tree trunk.
meanings.sent2: She scanned the room dorsoventrally, looking for her lost keys.
meanings.sent3: The cat wiggled dorsoventrally through the narrow gap in the fence.
meanings.sent4: The river flowed dorsoventrally, carrying leaves downstream.
meanings.sent5: The sun rose dorsoventrally, painting the sky with hues of pink and orange.

meanings.definition: In a direction from the dorsal to the ventral side
meanings.sent1: The snake slithered dorsoventrally along the branch.
meanings.sent2: The surgeon made an incision dorsoventrally to access the internal organs.
meanings.sent3: The kite soared dorsoventrally in the clear blue sky.
meanings.sent4: The elevator moved dorsoventrally, taking us to the top floor.
meanings.sent5: The roller coaster twisted dorsoventrally, thrilling the riders.
